mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM onclick_student WHERE sdelYn='N' AND sidx=#{sidx}
select * from onclick_student where sdelyn='N' and sidx=#{id} and spwd=#{pwd}
select a.eidx, a.sidx, a.lidx, b.lname from onclick_enroll a inner join onclick_prolec b on a.lidx = b.lidx where a.sidx=#{sidx}
select a.eidx, a.sidx, a.lidx, b.tuname from onclick_enroll a inner join onclick_taskupload b on a.lidx = b.lidx where a.sidx=#{id}
select * from onclick_taskupload where tedelyn='n' and tuname=#{tuname} order by tudate desc limit 5
